translations: adj．被剥夺权利的，被剥夺选举权的：指失去投票权或其他公民权利的人。
· The disfranchised citizens protested against the new law.
被剥夺权利的公民对新法律表示抗议。

sentences.sentence: Millions were disfranchised in parliamentary elections in April.
sentences.translation: 4月份议会选举中几百万人被剥夺选举权。

sentences.sentence: It is part of the Mae Fah Luang Foundation, set up under royal patronage to help the disfranchised ethnic minorities of northern Thailand.
sentences.translation: 文史馆是皇太后基金会的一部分，由皇家赞助建立，以帮助泰国北部权利被损害的少数名族。

sentences.sentence: Literature is my Utopia. Here I am not disfranchised. No barrier of the senses shuts me out from the sweet, gracious discourse of my book friends.
sentences.translation: 文学就是我的乌托邦。在这里，我不会被剥夺公民权。任何感官的残障，都不会阻却我和我的书本朋友间深刻优美的对谈。
